content.detailedDescription:
so unbelievable its hard to tell people. september 2009. this entity made contact with me and i quickly came to realize that it had the ability to control everything it is like a inter-dimensional web spread throughout the whole universe. it controls everything, the wind/weather and even peoples own movements and thoughts. it tried/did bring me into the illuminati. this entity controls and runs the illuminati. it literally talks to me everyday even up till now 4 years later. it gives me the best sensations you could ever imagine; massages my whole body even inside your brain, also sexual things. but it also tortures me like you couldnt believe, feels like being electrocuted, or squeezes your brain and heart. it hurts me because it tells me to stop telling everybody about whats going on and i just wont stop. it selected me because 'she' liked my thoughts and problem solving. i was put in charge of the illuminati and told them what to do. i was never really apart of them though. i was told to watch the news everyday and had to give my best opinion on solving world problems. i have many more experiences with this entity spanning over 4 years so far. i think it is important to get out the information i know. 

    the ufo sightings happened more than once as these beings were communicating with me. i suspect they are part of the illuminati or may have started it. penticton, b.C. canada, september 2009, at the begining of my contact, the entity was performing biblical acts, and during one of these in the clouds where it was controlling the wind perfectly to make a "slideslow" of animals of earth and creatures of elsewhere, 2 triangle ufos flew over near the end of the slideshow which lasted around an hour. they were flying by to let me know i was not alone in this. after years of contact with this entity another contact with beings in a ufo happened in spring of 2011 at mable lake b.C. canada, while i was camping. i was looking up at the stars while communicating with the godlike entity. a circle ufo showed up and came down and hovered above the lake. this entity and aliens all communicate telepathically, and even other humans in the illuminati are able to do this as well. the entity links desired beings up for them to be able to communicate telepathically. this ufo over mable lake was talking to me, it hovered and then would move left for no and right for yes. i couldnt convince them to land and they took off after more than a half hour. 

  i have more experiences and important information that i have had a hard time trying to get out for obvious reasons. please help me or direct someone who can in my direction. it says not to give out your public info but i already have elsewhere. feel free to contact me my name is marshall shelswell i am on facebook. would like to hear from someone else who knows or is involved with this entity and is brave enough to speak out. i know many who are aware but are too scared of this entity and what it can do.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Much more than a ufo event.

content.detailedDescription: Last night 9/6/2013, i was walking my dog around 9:00 p.M. (i took video at 8:58 p.M.) when i saw what i thought was a hot air balloon high in the sky, because i could see flames.  this was moving in a straight line and too fast to be a balloon and way too high in the sky.  then i thought that maybe it was a plane on fire but it wasn't falling and it kept moving across the sky.  i took out my phone and videotaped it.  i was really expecting for whatever it was to suddenly explode but it just kept moving across the sky until it the fire either went out or it just disappeared.
content.summary: Fireball seen over southside easton, pa

content.detailedDescription: Extremely bright lights, increasing red- as if entering orbit. then the white/yellow lights, rapid movement change, most coming from same direction, i got an extremely close look at one which came right near me and looked like an old diver's helmet
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Boomerang,   Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Extraordinarily bright, jagged, hovering, one came extraordinarily close, i saw everything on that one

content.detailedDescription: Saw a formation of 8 objects, set in pairs, then another from the right.  my friend was leaving at 1:20 am and called me seconds after he had left telling me to get out here now, i went out looked n/nw and saw a glittering glowing orange/red series of lights slowly seperating but staying in pairs, 8 total making a formation. they all spread out and then literally dissapaited and vanished, then all the sudden from our right comes from over the houses a bright larger version of what we saw came over th where these 8 onjects had vanished and hovered there, it moved strange very jerky movements but maintained a bee line for the area where the others disappeared.  no noise at all and it was dead quiet in my neighborhood.  it was soo eerie looking in the black sky.  now at 2:5 am the are where the objects were is all cloud covered now.  ive researched this site and there appears to be an actual ufo flap going on in our area, look at the recent sightings in south jersey, all the same i was suprised to also read people saying that it has been happeneing nightly.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a formation of 8 objects, set in pairs, then another from the right

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday aug 31 2013 11:45 pm north bay mall parking lot my father and i saw two reddish white orbs traveling slow in parallel from one another over east side mario's heading north. it was an overcast evening and a low cloud base so these things were low and could not be mistaken for anything conventional. one orb was higher up and it winked out or disappeared into the cloud base as it traveled.  

as my father dropped me off at home we saw another bright one under the cloud base heading north along king st and i watched it until it disappeared. my father went to the airport to see if there was any traffic but control tower it was shut down for the night.
content.summary: Orbs over east side mario's north bay ontario

content.detailedDescription: Before seeing the hovering craft, a couple hours later i went to sleep. i was laying in my bed, i woke up to find three figures above my bed about 3-4 feet tall, it was hard to tell what they looked like as when they were by me i was totally paralyzed, i managed to turn my head, they seemed to be reptilian looking in nature, i couldn't speak or move, they were touching and what felt like objects or their fingers, were going into my belly button and genitals, i was very afraid and was trying to yell but couldn't, i managed to yell for help and when i did that they seemed to turn invisible with some sort of cloak, but they were still there and touching me. i blacked out and woke up two more times with them standing next to my bed touching me or doing something physically to my body of these times i was unable to move or yell.
content.summary: Hovering craft

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:30 pm eastern time i got into my hot tub on my deck outside my house. as i usually do, i observed the stars and was staring into the constellation cassiopeia. at approximately 9:40 i saw two bright flashes about midway in the constellation. the light was brighter than the brightest star in the constellation by about 2 times. the two pulses were stationary as the light did not seem to change location. i continued to monitor that part of the sky but saw nothing unusal.
content.summary: Constellation cassiopeia

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from the movies with my mom and friend heading into downtown bakersfield and i noticed a light in the sky through the car windshield.At first i thought it was a plane or helicopter cause you see them all the time around there but it was too high to be a helicopter so then i moved on to it being a plane and the lights on it shined so bright not like a planes lights would shine it was moving really slow but the lights on it shocked me they blinked so bright but it started moving towards my neighborhood and then it disapeared. later when i was outside my house waited for my friend i saw it again.It was the same object cause it had those bright lights and was moving slow i've seen helicopters and planes in my neighborhood i know what they look like i see them all the time flying by this object didn't look like either one.It was moving over the park i could see it over my friends house.It kept moving back and forth in the same spot my friend finally came and he saw it again too it was very strange how it kept on moving back and forth in the same spot like it was observing. as it was moving back and forth i listend for sound and i didn't hear any sound coming from it.Me and my friend went back inside because we didn't know what it was gonna do. i don't know what it was we saw that night but it was very strange.
content.summary: I was driving with my mom and friend and saw a bright light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I went outside about 12:20 on 9/2 2013. i noticed a light to the northeast about 4 or 5 times the size of a star. it was moving slightly and pulsating what looked like white and yellow or orange light. i thought it might be a drone since i knew it wasn't a plane or helicopter. my wife saw it too and went to get her tablet to record video of the object. i also called my daughter to see it she also could not explain what we were seeing. it looked unlike anything we had ever seen in the sky. as i was recording the object my wife noticed another one to the east and at some point a third came into view between the other two but further off in the distance. when i zoomed in on the first object it looked like a diamond shape that changed to a square as well as changed colors and intensity. during the recordings a second light appeared which made me wonder if the light was the object or just a light on a bigger object. when both lights were visible it looked like it could have been a horse shoe shape with light on each end. it was hard to tell all i know is i never saw anything like it before. i watched for over two hours and they were still there when i went to bed at 2:45
content.summary: Bright pulsating light southern indiana

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i went for our evening walk around the apartment complex towards night fall (dusk). the evening sky was clear and the stars were just starting to shine. every now and then i would look up to see the stars and about the third time around the apartment complex i looked up and seen two what looked to be airplanes in different areas of the sky because of the blinking lights.
 around the fourth turn of our walk i looked up again in approximately the same area to look at the stars and noticed a wave shaped cloud in the form of a "s" shape but wasn't shaped exactly like an "s"; any way it was moving kind of fast and being that it was a clear knight i knew it was odd that that cloud was the only one in the sky. i pointed up and asked my husband what is that and he said he didn't know, so we both were watching it intently, it seemed to disappear or dissipate then we saw what i believe was a ufo. it was v shaped and it seemed it was moving in that dissipating cloud. i seen the belly and shape of the object. it looked almost white but this could be because to flew over a near by gas station and other businesses where it was well lit. it also had grey round looking fixtures on the belly. the object wasn't lit up and it had no sound at all to it. the object seemed to disappear as it flew out of sight, but we kept watching as we walked to see if maybe we could still see it.  
i don't have anything to show but i can draw a sketch of it.
content.summary: I looked up and seen an wave like thin colud and asked my husband what it was; he didn't know

content.detailedDescription: I had just left my girlfriends house outside of winston salem off of i-40 heading east toward. i-52 , when i noticed and odd shapes object in the sky not very high above the city of winston, at 3:30 am. the object was visibly projecting light! to be clear not reflecting, but projecting a beam of light toward the ground. i kept an eye on it to see if i could notice and red or green lights like a plane or helicopter would have and after a few minutes i was able to determine indeed it did not have any. i continued onto hwy 52 heading south when i noticed it had moved drastically south and had somewhat changed what the shape was. i pulled over after a few minutes to get a better look and shut my car off to see if i could hear anything. with no traffic in sight it was dead silence, i could not her a sound coming from this. i took my phone out and continued to take about 15 pictures and as i zoomed in that's when it became extremely obvious this was not any aircraft i have eer seen before. it continued to change shapes, from a half sphere to almost a boomerang of multiple lights. a few pictures you can actually see that it had multiple individual lights on the perimeter of it. it seem to come a little closer after a bit and i was by myself and nervous , so proceeded down 52 south with the craft staying constantly to my left side, after about 25 minutes i made it to interstate 85 and headed south west, that when the craft continued a south bound path and i eventually lost site of it.
content.summary: Half sphere/boomerang shaped formation of lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside in a chair, just relaxing, trying to get my mind off things. i first noticed the object when came up in the distance then just started hovering stationary right in front of me. i didn't know what the object was because i had never seen any earthly vehicles do what it did. it was a black circle with 3 orange-red glowing lights that would pulsate and in the middle of it was an extremely bright little blinking white light that would blink at random. it would fly around really slowly, then just stop for about two minutes, then hover to another direction and do the same thing. i felt fascinated, yet kind of scared but not in danger in a way, making me just sit there and watch it. after about 3 minutes of it just hovering in front of me as if it was observing me, it took off slowly to the north, directly over my neighborhood. i live in an area between where it's rural, but kind of close to the city. i see weird things every once in awhile.
content.summary: Saw a strange black circle flying in the sky with 3 orange glowing lights under it. it would fly in one direction, then stop and just hover.

content.detailedDescription:
Had packed up after a night at the roadhouse and was having a cigarette with three others.
thought we saw a chinese lantern but then it changed colour which caught our attention, then it moved very quickly against the wind then changed direction two or three times, changing colour each time. finally it came to a direct halt and shot straight upwards leaving a glowing trail behind it.
content.summary: Near the roundhouse in birmingham late night, calm and witnessed by 4 people

content.detailedDescription: Feel like i've been sein them kinda a lot the past months cought my eye as soon as i let my dog outside
content.summary: Changing colors moving slowly then just vanished seen two of them one red one white

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear, chilly evening on sept. 4, 2013 approx. 9:15p.M. my fiance and i had just got home from a dinner with my parents, my dad was dropping our dog off at our house and as he was leaving i saw a bright light off in the distance approx. 3-5 miles away, in an easterly direction.  as my father is a pilot, i tried to get him to see it, but the object had disappeared beyond the treeline. i left it at that, as he invited us to his house to show us his latest work on his fireplace.  so as my girlfriend and i were going to our car and i happened to look up as it was a star filled sky and the bright light was still in my mind, the time that had passed since seeing the light was about ten minutes.  what i saw when i looked up absolutely shocked me.  it was a totally silent, black triangular shaped craft, it's shape was perfectly outlined against the night sky.  it must have been over 100 feet wide and only 500-1500 feet max above the trees, with a bright white light on each point, and a red beacon in the center.  
i immediately thought b-2 bomber, but then thought we don't usually have those flying over pa, and why would it be flying so low...And then it really hit me as to how slow it was going. it could of only been doing 50mph at most!  now coming from a background in aviation, i really was bothered because something that big should stall at that slow of speed. we jumped in our car as we did not have a camera and drove to my parents house just up the road to get them to see it and possibly get a camera.  it took almost 5 minutes for it to travel out of our line of sight! they got to see just the tail end of it off in the distance. it just slowly flew off into the horizon in a north easterly direction.  i personally believe it was a military craft of some sort...Regardless it was an unknown craft that was very bizarre in size, speed, and altitude.
content.summary: Slow, silent, low flying black, triangular object directly above us.

content.detailedDescription: Northern/central maine,usa, august,approx 9:30pm. i went out to my yard with a camera to record the night sky, the moon & stars ect. i looked up(s)and saw a close,low flying intense bright lighted object & notice there was no sound. it was moving from s to n-nw. i called to my gf to come out and see, she was witness to the event. i began recording with the camera and was eventually able to stabilize it on a tripod and record it moving low across the sky. when i lost sight of it behind the trees, i ran to an open area and continued filming until it disappeared. it flew low and hovered silently and steadily in the sky at approx 30 degrees, just over the power line, trees and eventually the hovered over the river for approx 2 minutes. there are several points of reference in the video, trees, buildings & the horizon. it did not appear to be a plane, helicopter,balloon or shooting star ect. i feel as thou it is something anomalous or supernatural. some of the erratic movement in the video is caused by the camera being set on the tripod. then it disappeared. (note) i have attached a video of the event.
content.summary: I went out to my yard to record the stars, moon & sky. when i looked up i saw a ball of light, moving silently, low in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
This morning i was awoken by a neighbor's visitor leaving around 5:30 a.M.  i got up to make coffee and looked out to the sky, usually over the monterey bay from our kitchen window.  i then looked out the living room window and saw a very bright light in the sky.  i thought at first it was a planet or bright star.  it seemed to be pulsating.  i grabbed the binoculars to see it more clearly.  it pulsated and rotated, had multi-colored lights outlining its shape and seemed to be multi-dimensional.  it hovered about in approximately the same position for about 1/2 hr.  of course i was excited, so woke up my husband and asked him to grab the camera to record video of it.  he reluctantly got up and retrieved the camera which i then attempted to capture what i saw with the binoculars.  other stars were in the sky, but not nearly as bright as this light.  planes also were observed to fly below this area, in a straight flight pattern with one red flashing light.  when i looked back up to the sky around 6:30 a.M., this light anomoly was gone.  the sun was coming up, and it was no longer visible. 

i've witnessed 2 other similar sitings during the past month over monterey bay.
content.summary: Bright object in se direction of sky observed

content.detailedDescription: It was about 9:40 on wednesday night, i was driving home from work . i work at newark liberty airport. i was heading down broadway, in bayonne to pick up my wife and month old son. while driving past the old blockbuster store on 23rd street , i saw an orange light appear to my left. i found this strange because i can usually tell the difference between an airplane and helicopter by the lights that flash. this orange light did not flash nor move. for some reason i just couldn't stop looking at the light. a few seconds later, about 100 yards away, a second orange light appeared. this is when i knew i was watching something different.When i reached 9th street the lights just disappeared.I told my wife,mom and sisters but no one believed me.So we all squeezed into car to see if i could see them again. after about 15 minutes my sisters and i saw two orange lights just appear over the down town diner, but these lights were just about 20 yards apart. with in 2 seconds these lights just faded and disappeared. i couldn't believe i saw what i saw. i know what a plane and helicopter look like, this was something different. the lights didn't make a sound, and when i got home with my wife and son 10 minutes later, my wife asked me if i was alright? i said yeah why? she said i looked really pale and i was sweating a lot. i had trouble sleeping as well. i know what i saw,now its all i think about some hours later.
content.summary: I witnessed two bright orange lights hovering down town bayonne.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my front porch having my morning coffee and was on a conference call.  i happened to glance at the sky and saw an airplane flying at approximately 15,000 - 18,000 ft altitude.  there was an object (white) flying in front of the plane.  this object seemed rectangular (difficult to ascertain the shape at that altitude) and was white in color.  the object was at the same altitude as the commercial airliner.  what caught my eye was that the plane had a contrail but the object did not.  the second thing that caught my eye was that the object was very close to the airplane (less than an inch from my vantage point).  the object stayed in-front of the plane for approximately 2 minutes and then simply disappeared (vanished).  i thought it may be the reflection from the plane since the plane was flying north/west and the sun was in the east but then i saw additional planes flying at the same altitude in approximately the same flight path and they did not have any reflections or objects around them.  the pilots of this plane must have seen the object since the size of the object and the altitude was similar to the plane.  the plane seemed like a commercial airliner (airbus/boeing) and the object was of similar size if not bigger.  the object was simply leading the airplane and did not perform any unusual motions but to me it seemed like it was hovering in front of the plane.  the airplane did not take any evasive actions but simply continued in a straight line.  only after the object disappeared did the plane bank five degrees to the right and continued in its path.  it was very strange.  i live near dulles airport, so see airplanes quite frequently and this plane given it altitude, could not have taken off from dulles but rather points south or south/east.
content.summary: A white object was in front of a plane flying at approximately 15,000 feet.  the object was very close to the plane and then it just disappeared in a blink of an eye.  the aircraft was a commercial airliner and had a contrail but the object did not.

content.detailedDescription:
For over a month on a near nightly basis, i , myself and friends have witnessed a strange, large object in the western sky
sometimes it is accompanied by other lights.
on this particular night.The large object ( much bigger than a star ), appeared . this object was bright yellow, white, green . it pulsated. i looked through my binoculars the object seemed to change shape from a sphere to an ellipse . it emitted energy appendages . 
the object hovered for 10 minutes and then slowly moved. it then moved to one spot and stayed for about 5 minutes. it grew brighter and dimmed. 
this object is in the flight path of the airport. two planes approached from different directions and when the planes got close it immediately disappeared . 
i have 100 photos .I have 3 nights of video on my sony night-vision camera .
i felt a direct connection to this object. i did not feel fear but i really believe it knew i was watching .

i would love to find people with similar sightings in this area to compare notes 
i have tried to talk to the media, the faa, kennecott copper, the salt lake international airport anybody i can think of.   the most helpful people have been astronomers in our area  and they said this is not conventional .
content.summary: Salt lake strange happenings

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the corner of 300s and northbound west temple in my bosses car waiting to pick him up at sometime between 10:55 and 11:00 pm. i was looking out the windshield of the car when i saw a pair of red and green lights to the north shoot up 15 degrees approximately 2.5 miles away, from behind ensign peak. the velocity of the object made me think it might have been a firework of some sort but it abruptly halted and hovered for a few seconds. it began moving towards the east but changed directions almost instantly and then rapidly traveled west until it reached about 5 degrees west of west temple and then slowly descended slightly eastbound, like a feather that has been dropped. it hovered about 2 degrees west of ensign peak for about 5 seconds before disappearing behind the mountain again. at the beginning of the event, both lights were approximately the same amount of brightness but as the object began traveling west the green light clearly dominated over the red. i must note that this object accelerated and decelerated at a much quicker rate than any aircraft i have ever seen. the entire event lasted approximately 30 seconds. at first i was filled with disbelief, trying to come up with an explanation. the only plausible one i could think of was that the object was some sort of recreational civilian drone, but it seems implausible that somebody would be flying it at night and that it would be large enough for me to see, the back side of ensign peak, where the object originated and eventually disappeared, being approximately 2.5 miles away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 red and green lights rose from behind ensign peak changed directions several times, then slowly descended behind the mountain

content.detailedDescription: I was driving past this high tech lab near cold spring harbor when i saw a ufo hovering in the parking lot in the lab to my right. the light was bright and pulsing and i felt compelled to park my car in the middle of rte 25a and walk towards the light. there were these rat-like creatures that reached into my head with imaginary fists and permanently shut my mouth. now i can not talk. i am terrified. will this ever get better???
content.summary: Ufo attack at illuminati laboratory

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on porch with friend saw objet approach from the west at first thought it might be a large hawk riding wind currents as it got close we noticed that the object was triangle shape black in color and no lights or sound. before crossing over our apt building it stopped in mid air and hovered for five minutes then proceeded on i wen inside to get my cam ran out the front door to film as it headed east but it just vanished i have 150 hours of flight time and this was no coventiual aircraft i am also a former mufon field investigator my friend was dubfounded
content.summary: Moving west to east hovered over building no lights silent

content.detailedDescription: Friend called told me to look to the north above mtns called san gabriel and so i did saw different lights go on and off in different places in the sky above the mtn until i saw the triangle came into view. very cool. but cant explain.
content.summary: Different lights randomly flashed on and off until i saw a triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was at the front door of my house watching my girlfriend get to her car safely because she was leaving to go home. at the same time my dog was sitting on my porch watching my girlfriend leave as well. after she left, i attempted to let my dog back into my house but he refused so i let him stay outside a little longer knowing he was not going to want to be there out much longer. i waited at my door and decided to look at the sky to search for stars and enjoy the night sky. i looked straight ahead towards the east and saw a commercial airplane that was miles away coming my way towards the west! not less than a second later to the southeast of my position i saw a greenish-white orb zoom past over my neighborhood coming from the west and heading to the east at an astonishing speed! it lasted no more than two seconds and disappeared before my eyes! i did not blink at all and nothing got in my way. the ufo was silent and did not leave any trails what so ever. it did not blink but instead maintained the glowing light it gave off. right after i saw the ufo i looked back at the airplane and it was still coming in the same direction and same location it was before i saw the ufo. then i let my dog in and called my girlfriend to tell her the exciting and bizarre news! i also yelled for my family to tell them what i saw as well even though i knew most of them were going to be skeptical. then i continued to look at the sky to see if i could see anything like it again! i know this was not a commercial airplane because for thirteen years i lived near o'hare international airport and i am familiar with their speed, size, lights, and sound. i know it was not a small airplane because they fly around where i live now and i know how fast they travel and how they look, sound, and how their lights blink on and off. none of the aircraft i have seen before, have a non-blinking light. it amazes me at how fast this thing traveled and how it did not make any sound at all and disappeared before my eyes. i must admit while i was excited to see it, i felt a little scared because i did not know what it's intentions were and i still don't. this is a mystery and i hope one day i can solve it and figure out what was going on in the night sky above me!
content.summary: Greenish-white orb ufo seen, then disappear out of nowhere!

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was just returning from a walk at night when at about 9:30 pm, i saw a white ufo almost straight above me or to the west. i would guess the altitude to be between 70 and 90 degrees above the horizon. i thought it was a satellite at first. i lost sight of it at about 9:35 pm or 9:40 pm or so, but when i lost sight of it, it was still at high altitude, to the north, at about 45 degrees above the horizon. i looked at a satellite passing chart at www.Heavens-above.Com for sightings above magnitude 5.0, but no objects listed fit what i saw.
content.summary: Sattelite ufo

content.detailedDescription: Star like dot,then pulsed twice, thought was satellite, until it headed 260 deg sw to horizon. then did a very quick zig zag motion and headed 29 deg ne following horizon. kept heading ne blinked twice then gone.
content.summary: Star like dot,then pulsed twice,  thought was satellite headed 260 deg sw. then did a zig zag  motion and headed west. kept heading west blinked twice then gone.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on s. 56th st. toward pine lake rd.  time ~ 7:15am. on sun., 9-1-13. cloudy day...There had been thunderstorms to the south of us and and lite and dark gray clouds persisted as they moved in a se direction.  no rain at the time of the sighting tho the pavement showed there must have been a brief shower.  no lightning/thunder at the time i was there.  breeze, but not windy. comfortable temperature.  as i drove up the upgrade from the rr crossing, i was the only vehicle going either way...Very quiet traffic day.  i was ~ a bit n of the shadow pines apt. complex when i noted the larger white rectangular box-like 'thing' crossing 56th st. from east to west.  i noted i had not seen anything approaching and no vehicle like a truck pulling it, and then realized there were no wheels.  it appeared to move straight across the street about roof height, but not necessarily over the rooftops.  maybe going about 20-30 mph.  if it had turned off 56th st., straightened out and was being towed, i don't think it could have gone that fast that quickly.  behind it was the horizon with the dark gray clouds.  it seemed to just disappear.  i was going about 45 mph, the speed limit, and in the southbound lane, which widens at the point where shadow pines ln is, at which time i moved to the curb lane (southbound).  as i passed madalyn rd, i looked down it to the west and saw nothing...Just houses, a few cars parked on the street.  no trucks, no trailers, no activity at all.  i didn't note any trailers parked anywhere.  the street curves some, but i was only a few seconds behind and could see quite a ways down, and saw nothing like what i had seen crossing the roadway.

overall, it seemed, like i noted, about the size of a popup camper when everything is packed and stowed.  except there were no other vehicles.  my window was down halfway and the radio was quite low with blues music, but i heard nothing unusual, as engines, or anything.  

i was surprised to see nothing down the side street.  it made me feel, "am i losing my mind?"  "what was that?!"  "is this how alzheimer's (or other dementia) starts?"  i have always believed we could have 'visitors', because 'we' are indeed here.  but this is the first i recall an 'event' such as this.  i still don't know any more about it, and would like to.   i am willing to accept a reasonable explanation for what i saw, but no one has had one at all, let alone one that makes sense.  i thought and thought about whether i'd missed something.  it wasn't a 'flash' of a 'feeling' or a 'sight'...It was definitely moving directly across the path i was on...And then gone when i approached just a few secs. later.
content.summary: White rectangular box-like, ~ pop-up camper size, moving straight about roof height from east to west across the street in front of me

content.detailedDescription:
I attended an airshow at the new garden flying field on saturday, august 24, 2013.  a friend, his wife, and i had set up lawn chairs at the far southwest area of the field to watch the show.  my camera is a canon eos 5d mark iii with a canon ef 70-200mm f/2.8l is ii usm autofocus lens.

at exactly 1 p.M. i was photographing an aerobatic biplane doing his routine.  after 2 or 3 shots, while looking through the viewfinder, i thought i saw an object in the smoke trail of the plane.  i thought perhaps something had fallen from the plane.  i figured it hadnt come from inside the plane as it had an enclosed cockpit.  as the plane moved off to the side i took several more shots of the smoke trail just to be sure i caught whatever it was i originally saw.  i then turned to ask my friend if he was seeing this too but he was talking to his wife so i turned back to take some more pictures but i could no longer find the object.

since the screen is too small on my camera to see properly, i waited until i got home to review my pictures.  it was then that i noticed a sphere at the very bottom of the first picture almost directly in a line beneath the plane and rising a bit higher in the second picture. in the third picture, the sphere can be seen now above the biplane.  this was all in a matter of about 5 or 6 seconds.

the remaining shots of just the smoke trail appear to show the object begin to flatten out into more of a disk shape.  it was at that point that i lost sight of the object.

i showed the emailed the pictures to my friend and he replied that he also thought he saw a glimpse of something during the routine but he wasnt sure what it was.

when i first looked at the pictures i thought it might be some sort of weather balloon but that air space was restricted during the show and it would be more than foolish to release a balloon during that kind of event.
also, i felt that the object ascended much faster than i would suspect a balloon might and when it reached an altitude above the biplane it seemed to stop rising.  thats when it appeared to become disk shaped and move to the left.
content.summary: Noticed sphere while taking photos of aerobatic plane at airshow.

content.detailedDescription:
Working notes:

facebook, 6:05 am 9/4/13,

(name withheld), a facebook friend alerted me:

"scott..Around 5:30 this morning klkn reported a strange light changing colors near the tv station..Their trying to explain it away...Its a triangle shape and they say it looks like teathers hanging off of it...Theyve mentioned it all morning..Its above the klkn tower...Something to check out..."  (end of quote).

i called the klkn newsroom,  bumped to two people who knew nothing about what i was seeking info about, and then referred me to sean, meteorologist, 9/4/13, 12:22 pm, gone home, left voice mail for him to return my call.  left voice mail for mark hager, news director.  3:30 pm, sent e-mails asking for additional info to klkn weather and klkn news departments.

contact: channel 8 klkn-tv
main telephone number-402-434-8000 
address:  klkn-tv, 3240 south 10th street, lincoln ne 68502

called lpd (lincoln police department) dispatch, 402-442-6000, asked if any reports had come in, phone operator said no, then i asked to have someone within the department call back, and she said a sargeant would call me back.

sent a friend (name withheld) a facebook message (works at klkn) for info.

sargent towle, lpd, 12:37 pm via return phone call, said he came to work at 6 am and no one has called in, and no officer has talked about it.

(name withheld), manager at u-stop convenience store, at 12:50 pm via phone, 1421 centerpark rd, said she can see the broadcast tower from her vantage point, and no one has mentioned anything.

super c convenience store, 3202 s. 10th st, (name withheld), called him 1:10 pm, he came to work at 5:30 am, didn't see anything, no one has mentioned it.

klkn has posted two pictures on their facebook page.  facebook page name:  channel 8 eyewitness news.  i have captured both images on my computer.

left message at nebraska national guard public relations department, 402-471-3241, 3:10 pm, to inquire if the guard had any helicopters or aircraft over or around lincoln, ne, between 5 - 6 pm.

left message with the lancaster county sheriff's department, 3:15 pm.  called back by officer lang at 3:30 pm, no one has contacted the sheriff's department, and, no officers have reported anything.

posted on (name withheld) facebook page, posting klkn tv picture and asking him for his input.  he is a meteorologist for unl.

end of working notes as of this time and date.
content.summary: Klkn tv lincoln, ne, broadcast pictures from their tower cam the early morning of 9/4/13
